content: create an adorable amigurumi spring chick with this crochet pattern measuring just 2 5 inches tall and 2 25 inches wide this charming little fella is perfect for small hands and fits neatly in a pocket making it ideal for on-the-go fun crafted in sport weight yarn this quick project takes about an hour to complete skill level advanced beginner crochet pattern sizes 2 5 inches tall x 2 25 inches wide languages available english **materials** required yarn scheepjes stone washed category #2 sport yardage 50 yards meterage 45 72 meters hooks us 3 0 - 3 25 mm us 1 0 - 2 25 mm gauges 52 stitches x 7 row = 1 inches in single_crochet **this pattern is available for free on my website which is monetized by ads if you prefer an ad-free version of the pattern it is available to purchase from my pattern shop ** ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
